name: Hero
description: Welcome to Hero! A simple 3rd person fantasy action adventure game created by Bakershah Games. The game is meant to be an homage to all the classical action adventure games from the 90's. It is a simplistic adventure game. Give it a try!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compliant video card with 512 MB of RAM - NVIDIA GeForce 7600 GT & ATI Radeon X1800. DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 5 GB available space
